attributes.action: Bar Piers Morgan from re-entering the UK
attributes.additional_details: Following the launch of a petition demanding his deportation from the United States, we the undersigned call on the British Government to deny Piers Morgan entry to the United Kingdom and to strip him of his British citizenship. In the event that Mr Morgan is granted access to neither the US nor the UK, we will also support his extraordinary rendition to any country known to employ torture as a means of interrogation.
